revised_title: Pendulum Operations for Determining the Relative Force of Gravity at Kew and Greenwich Observatories
tldr: The author discusses the pendulum operations conducted at Kew and Greenwich observatories to determine the relative force of gravity. The observations were made to establish a connection between the observations in India and other parts of the world. The final results show an excess of 0.64 of a vibration at Kew over Greenwich, which is considered a fairly probable value.
